metadata.title: CVE-2021-26712 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect access controls in res_srtp.c in Sangoma Asterisk 13.38.1,16.16.0, 17.9.1, and 18.2.0 and Certified Asterisk 16.8-cert5 allow aremote unauthenticated attacker to prematurely terminate secure calls byreplaying SRTP packets.

criterions.comment: asterisk package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
